sentences.en: a large square room
sentences.cn: 一个正方形的大房间

sentences.en: Cairo has only thirteen square centimetres of green space for each inhabitant.
sentences.cn: 开罗居民的人均绿地面积仅13平方厘米。

sentences.en: Click the square icon again to minimize the window.
sentences.cn: 再次点击正方形图标，把窗口最小化。

sentences.en: don't you worry, we'll get things squared away.
sentences.cn: 不用担心，我们会把一切都做好的。

sentences.en: First of all, draw a square.
sentences.cn: 首先，画一个正方形。

sentences.en: has always dealt on the square.
sentences.cn: 总是坦诚待人

sentences.en: He brought the car to a stop in front of the square.
sentences.cn: 他在广场前把车停了下来。

sentences.en: His finger nails were square and cut neatly across.
sentences.cn: 他的手指甲是方形的，修剪得很齐。

sentences.en: I knew I'd never find a parking space in the Square.
sentences.cn: 我知道在广场上肯定找不到停车位。

sentences.en: India won the second match to square the series at one each.
sentences.cn: 印度队赢了第二场，把循环赛积分扳为一平。

sentences.en: Its total surface area was seven thousand square feet.
sentences.cn: 它的总表面积为7,000平方英尺。

sentences.en: Marilyn made her last public appearance at Madison Square Garden.
sentences.cn: 玛丽莲最后一次公开亮相是在麦迪逊广场花园。

sentences.en: Rescue crews had scoured an area of 30 square miles.
sentences.cn: 救援人员已经搜遍了30平方英里的范围。

sentences.en: She lives in Hanover Square.
sentences.cn: 她住在汉诺威广场。

sentences.en: The bus drew up in the village square and disgorged its passengers.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车驶达乡村广场后停车下客。

sentences.en: The islands cover a total area of 625.6 square kilometers.
sentences.cn: 这些岛屿总面积为625.6平方公里。

sentences.en: The Philippines has just 6,000 square kilometres of forest left.
sentences.cn: 菲律宾只剩下6,000平方公里的森林了。

sentences.en: The square of 4 is 16.
sentences.cn: 4 的平方是 16。

sentences.en: The square was packed, and the cobbled streets flowed with coloured petals.
sentences.cn: 广场上挤满了人，鹅卵石铺就的街道上满是五颜六色的花朵。

sentences.en: The stinging nettle has a square stem and little hairs.
sentences.cn: 荨麻长有四方茎和细小茸毛。

sentences.en: They dragged him to the village square and chopped his head off.
sentences.cn: 他们将他拖到村里的广场上，把他的头砍了下来。

sentences.en: They haven't had a square meal for four or five days.
sentences.cn: 他们已经四五天没吃上一顿像样的饭了。

words.tran_cn: 直角地；诚实地；正好；干脆地；正当地
方形；小心拘谨，一丝不苟
使成正方形；求平方值（square的ing形式）

phrases.phrase: a square peg in a round hole

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)回到起点，回到原处；无所进展
最小二乘法；最小平方法
均方误差；中误差；均方差
整理：在…放起来或整齐地放
摆出作战姿势；准备作战

phrases.phrase: square peg in a round hole【非正式用语】

phrases.tran_cn: (北美)把…弄整齐；把…做得使人满意
作一与已知圆面积相等的正方形（一个不能用纯几何的方法来解决的问题）
泰晤士广场（位于美国纽约市曼哈顿区）

trans.tran_cn: 方形的，平方的，厚实的，两清的，公平的
trans.tran_en: having four straight equal sides and 90˚ angles at the corners

trans.tran_cn: 正方形，广场，平方，书呆子
trans.tran_en: a shape with four straight equal sides with 90˚ angles at the corners

trans.tran_cn: 使成四方形，使平方，挺直身子，打平，买通
trans.tran_en: to multiply a number by itself

trans.tran_cn: 相符， 一致； 打成平局
trans.tran_en: to win a point or game so that you have now won the same number of points or games as the other team or player

trans.tran_cn: 求…的平方根；使相符，使一致；使打平；使变直；结清
trans.tran_en: to multiply a number by itself
